title: [GAMEPLAY] Nami doesn't heal properly
body:
I was playing 2 games of ARAM as Nami and I realised that even though I was maxing W (heal), the amount of the heal is not the correct one. 
I had ap items and maxed W and i was healing around 100 hp
Can you please have a look at this?
Thanks.

replies.body: I don't know if this was causing the issue for you but as far as I understand it ARAM has 50% reduced healing on allies.
Yup! ARAM does have reduced healing effects. IIRC, it's 20%.
